resources.string: Incorrect service code entered. Please try again.
Incorrect service code entered multiple times. Turning the device off.
This will reset your device. All user data will be wiped from the device.

Your device has encountered an error when trying to connect to the network that requires a reset. Would you like to reset the device? This will remove your account from this device but will not remove your personal data.
The network is preparing your services. Please wait…
The profile update could not be completed. Please try again later. If the problem persists, you may need to contact Customer Service.
"Configuring your device for voice and data. Please wait…"
The device has been activated. Press OK to continue.
The PRL has been upgraded. Press OK to continue.
Checking for Firmware update. Please wait…
Device activation failed. If the problem persists, you may need to contact Customer Service.

"Warning: SCRTN will execute the following operation and reboot phone, are you sure to continue? Reset the MDN to factory default Reset the MSID to factory default Reset the Slot 1 NAI to factory default Reset the Slot 1 NAI password to factory default"
During configuration, your mobile service may be temporarily unavailable. This should only take a few minutes.
